ygData.subject: Re: fight?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Sabertooth Tiger walks through the forest slowly and methodically. It keeps checking it s surroundings and sniffs the air.  It walks almost silently

The Sabertooth Tiger walks through the forest slowly and methodically.
It keeps checking it's surroundings and sniffs the air.  It walks 
almost silently through the trees and bushes.  It smells a wolf near 
by.

It's hunger knows no bounds and it is very hungery.  It follows the 
scent trail and passes an old pod.  It reaches up with it's paws and 
holds it's head up to look inside the pod.  It sniffs around and 
smells the scent of decay and old metal.  It nudges some remains of a 
bot with it's paw.  The torso of the bot crumbles and falls apart.
The Tiger jumps back and growls.  It hits the pod with it's enormous 
paws and shakes the pod.  It roars and backs up a few paces.  It runs 
and rams into the pod, turning the pod over and dumping the remains 
of the bot on the ground.  The tiger walks around the pod and sees 
the remains on the ground.  It walks over and starts to knaw on the 
remains.  

When finished, the tiger sniffs the air and finds the scent of the 
wolf again. The tiger walks away from the pod and follows the trail 
of the wolf.

(OK Lunarpine, you now have something following you. Watch out)
